sql.if: join tsc_commodity_order_detail t1 on t.code = t1.commodity_code

if.test: minSpecPrice != null and minSpecPrice != '' and maxSpecPrice != null and maxSpecPrice != ''

trim.if: and t.code in (select distinct commodity_code from tsc_commodity_specs where price > #{minSpecPrice} and price < #{maxSpecPrice})

if.test: minSpecPrice != null and minSpecPrice != '' and maxSpecPrice == null

trim.if: and t.code in (select distinct commodity_code from tsc_commodity_specs where price > #{minSpecPrice})

if.test: maxSpecPrice != null and maxSpecPrice != '' and minSpecPrice == null

trim.if: and t.code in (select distinct commodity_code from tsc_commodity_specs where price < #{maxSpecPrice})

mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.name ,t.parent_category_code ,t.category_code ,t.deliver_place
,t.weight ,t.original_price ,t.original_place ,t.logistics ,t.month_sell_count ,t.list_pic ,t.banner_pic
,t.description ,t.shop_code ,t.sell_user_id ,t.max_jfdk_rate ,t.single_postage_count
,t.location ,t.order_no ,t.status ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime ,t.remark ,t.approve_note
,(select min(tsc_commodity_specs.price) from tsc_commodity_specs where tsc_commodity_specs.commodity_code = t.code) as min_price ,(select max(tsc_commodity_specs.price) from tsc_commodity_specs where tsc_commodity_specs.commodity_code = t.code) as max_price ,(select sum(tsc_commodity_specs.inventory) from tsc_commodity_specs where tsc_commodity_specs.commodity_code = t.code) as total_inventory FROM tsc_commodity t
${order}
select distinct original_place from tsc_commodity where original_place <> '' and original_place is not null
select distinct deliver_place from tsc_commodity where deliver_place <> '' and deliver_place is not null
SELECT DISTINCT t.shop_code ,t.deliver_place FROM tsc_commodity t
